Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 40th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1948...
Injured on 8/17/1948 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 6/5/1949 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/8/1949 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/10/1952, off Patrick Bannon (WIS)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/1953, off James Glaude (MAN)...
Was selected to the 1955 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (FBA) on 9/7/1955...
Signed as a free agent by Manchester on 2/27/1957 to a 3-year deal worth $574,000 per year...
Injured on 5/15/1959 with a Fractured Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/8/1960 to a 4-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Drafted in 2nd round, 42nd overall pick, by Penn in 1967...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/9/1971, off Arden Custis (Ash)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/16/1971, off David Hayes (WT)...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Ashburn, driving in 4 runs on 8/25/1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1974, hitting .419 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1974 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Penn in 1974...
Had 6 hits with 2 RBI against Gashouse on 4/14/1975...
Won World Championship with Penn in 1975...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1976, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Drove in 9 runs against Capital City on 4/22/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1977, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1977, hitting .394 with 7 HR, 29 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1977, hitting .416 with 5 HR, 25 RBI...
Traded from Penn to Pittsburgh on 2/12/1978 (Going to PEN: RF R. Gonsalves, C C. Miller, SS C. Primeaux. Going to PIT: LF R. Doan)...
Hit for the cycle against New Jersey on 4/16/1978...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Boston (UBA) on 10/21/1978...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1978...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1980, hitting .467 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Manchester on 9/6/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1980, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1980, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 16 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1981, hitting .342 with 4 HR, 17 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1981...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/6/1982 to a 5-year deal worth $6,294,400 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1982, hitting .571 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1982, hitting .405 with 5 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1983, hitting .522 with 1 HR, 1 RBI...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
